casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Robert PARISI 65A17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 7, 2018 John W. Congleton, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Parisi, Jeffrey Robert.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of September 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of September 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 20th day of September 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
